Enumeration Type Documentation

enum RemPlaybackState

Playback states.

Enumerator:
REM_PS_STATE_STOP  Stop.
REM_PS_STATE_PLAY  Play.
REM_PS_STATE_PAUSE  Paused.
REM_PS_STATE_OFF  The player is OFF.
REM_PS_STATE_COUNT 

enum RemPlayerStatusCompareResult

Flags describing differences between two RemPlayerStatus.

See also:
rem_player_status_compare()
Enumerator:
REM_PS_DIFF_NONE  No difference.
REM_PS_DIFF_SVRSP  state, volume, repeat, shuffle and/or cap_pos differs.
REM_PS_DIFF_PID  cap_pid differs.
REM_PS_DIFF_ALL  All differ.

enum RemRepeatMode

Playback repeat modes.

Enumerator:
REM_PS_REPEAT_MODE_NONE  No repeat.
REM_PS_REPEAT_MODE_PLOB  Repeat the current plob.
REM_PS_REPEAT_MODE_ALBUM  Repeat the current album.
REM_PS_REPEAT_MODE_PL  Repeat the playlist.

enum RemShuffleMode

Playback shuffle modes.

Enumerator:
REM_PS_SHUFFLE_MODE_OFF  Sequential play order.
REM_PS_SHUFFLE_MODE_ON  Random play order.
